message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice! While I appreciate the value of the product, $15,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $15,000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer for now.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $12,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  This is my final offer.
I'm glad you're willing to go up to $11,000, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $12,000. This is my final offer.
